DellSwitchConnection.description: An instance of DellSwitchConnection will have the switch connection view information of all the ports.
DellSwitchConnection.longDescription: An instance of DellSwitchConnection will have the switch connection view information of all the ports.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FQDD.description: A string containing the Fully Qualified Device Description, a user-friendly name for the object.
FQDD.longDescription: A string containing the Fully Qualified Device Description, a user-friendly name for the object.

InstanceID.description: A unique identifier for the instance.
InstanceID.longDescription: A unique identifier for the instance.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

StaleData.description: This property indicates whether the information in this instance is stale or not.
StaleData.longDescription: This property indicates whether the information in this instance is stale or not.

SwitchConnectionID.description: This property represents the Chassis ID information of the switch port.It can contain one of the mentioned value "Not Available","Feature Disabled","No Link","Not Supported" and Chassis ID information extracted from LLDP packet.
SwitchConnectionID.longDescription: This property represents the Chassis ID information of the switch port.It can contain one of the mentioned value "Not Available","Feature Disabled","No Link","Not Supported" and Chassis ID information extracted from LLDP packet.

SwitchPortConnectionID.description: This property represents the port description information of the switch.It can contain one of the mentioned value "Not Available","Feature Disabled","No Link","Not Support" and "Port description information extracted from LLDP packet".
SwitchPortConnectionID.longDescription: This property represents the port description information of the switch.It can contain one of the mentioned value "Not Available","Feature Disabled","No Link","Not Support" and "Port description information extracted from LLDP packet".

title: #DellSwitchConnection.v1_1_0.DellSwitchConnection
